column4: anyone can help me fixing my resolution? can't set it to bigger than 800x600. (Fujitsu-Siemens Esprimo v5535 notebook)
Have you gone to the settings menu?
i tried to set the vga driver from vesa to sis as all the threads say, but when I restart i get an error msg telling me that it'unable
I tried but my settings menu says Unknown Monitor, Unknown Video Graphics, et etc
yes i have internet since i'm connected to irc atm from my ubuntu system :)
Ok, you might need a proprietary driver
yes but the one everyone say as proper driver, gives me the 'unable to load driver' error msg
please run the command without quotes in your terminal "lspci" and post the output in pastebin
it's got me a bit fuzzled
I'm afraid I don't know exactly what's affecting you atm
it's simple. 800x600 sucks, and if i set the driver in xorg.conf from'vesa' to 'sis' it gives me an error message telling me 'unable to load driver'
